name: Traffic Driver Racing
description:
Drive your car, feel the freedom and enjoy the speed of the ride!

Traffic Driver Racing is an amazing arcade racing game, where you are a skilled and professional racer, who rides the car and complete different challenges in an endless race! Get in your car and let's go! There is a full career mode with a lot of missions and rewards. If you want to beat all the missions you will have to earn enough cash to buy all the possible upgrades and buy the best car in the store.

In Traffic Driver Racing you are going to explore an endless highway roads. Play in Free Ride mode and enjoy beautiful landscapes and try to overtake the traffic. Traffic Driver Racing is a unique gaming experience with smooth and simple gameplay, realistic 3D graphics and real HD sounds.

Traffic Driver Racing game features:
- Over 20 missions in career mode;
- Whole store of cars of any kind;
- Detailed highway and landscape;
- First person camera view;
- Free Ride mode
- Amazing 3D graphics;

If you are a big fan of racing simulator games, if you like motorsport and enjoy a highway freedom, then Traffic Driver Racing is exactly what you need. Get in your car right now and have a really good time and a lot of fun!
